verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:22
verses.text: These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among three mighty men.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:23
verses.text: He was more honourable than the thirty, but he attained not to the first three. And David set him over his guard.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:24
verses.text: Asahel the brother of Joab was one of the thirty; Elhanan the son of Dodo of Beth–lehem,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:25
verses.text: Shammah the Harodite, Elika the Harodite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:26
verses.text: Helez the Paltite, Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:27
verses.text: Abiezer the Anethothite, Mebunnai the Hushathite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:28
verses.text: Zalmon the Ahohite, Maharai the Netophathite,
